description:
On New Year`s Eve, the Asabane household finds itself a little busier than usual with cleaning.
While cleaning their room, Yuta accidentally gets water on Yuki`s manga.
Yuta and Yuki get into a fight, ending with Yuki leaving the house.
Yuta has trouble understanding the situation until a piece of paper he finds in the edge of his room triggers his memory.
Source: crunchyroll
